comprehensive_overview: BEAST is a cross-platform program for Bayesian analysis of molecular sequences using MCMC (Markov Chain Monte Carlo) methods. It is widely used for phylogenetic inference, divergence time estimation, and molecular dating.
core_features:
1. Bayesian phylogenetic inference
2. Divergence time estimation
3. Molecular dating
4. Cross-platform compatibility
5. MCMC methods for parameter estimation
